# BLAS

> Standard library basic linear algebra subroutines (BLAS).

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var blas = require( '@stdlib/math/base/blas' );
```

#### blas

Standard library basic linear algebra subroutines (BLAS).

```javascript
var o = blas;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
